Package com.bitpay.sdk.model.Invoice

Class InvoiceUniversalCodes

java.lang.Object
com.bitpay.sdk.model.Invoice.InvoiceUniversalCodes
public class InvoiceUniversalCodes extends Object
Object containing wallet-specific URLs for payment protocol.
